meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting an external skeleton.
meanings.sent1: The exoskeletal armor of the beetle provides protection.
meanings.sent2: The exoskeletal structure of the crab is hard and tough.
meanings.sent3: The exoskeletal suit for the superhero was shiny and strong.
meanings.sent4: The exoskeletal shell of the turtle shields it from harm.
meanings.sent5: The exoskeletal exoskeleton of the insect is like a shield around its body.

meanings.sent1: The exoskeletal insects molt to grow bigger.
meanings.sent2: The exoskeletal nature of the lobster makes it different from mammals.
meanings.sent3: The exoskeletal robot looked like a futuristic creature.
meanings.sent4: The exoskeletal armor of the knight gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The exoskeletal protection of the arthropod is its strength.

meanings.sent1: The exoskeletal of the beetle is on the outside of its body.
meanings.sent2: The exoskeletal of the crab is what makes it a crustacean.
meanings.sent3: The exoskeletal of the robot was made of shiny metal plates.
meanings.sent4: The exoskeletal of the turtle is like a shield against predators.
meanings.sent5: The exoskeletal of the insect provides support and protection.
